title: Support group.mincount for Result Grouping
description:
Result Grouping is a very useful feature: we can use it to find duplicate data in index, but it lacks of one feature-group.mincount. 

With group.mincount, we can specify that only groups that has equal or more than ${mincount} for the group field will be returned.

Specially, we can use group.mincount=2 to only return duplicate data.
Could we add this in future release? Thanks.

comments.author: Ryan Josal
comments.content: I just came across a use case where this would be useful, like facet.mincount sometimes is.  I'm not sure Type: Bug is the correct classification though.
